no_beacons_encountered_info: Here you can find content triggered by beacons near you.
here_visited_apps_will_show: Here the content you have visited with this app will show.
here_visited_apps_will_show_info: Enter a code in the address bar above or scan a QR code.
confirm_delete_bookmark: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
unknown_bluetooth_error: An unknow error has occurred. Try turning your bluetooth off and on again, then navigate to other page and back again.
turn_on_bluetooth: Please turn on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is required to use Beacons.
connection_error: A connection error has occured. Please try again.
